query:
SELECT 
  uc.id, 
  uc.userId, 
  ct.nameZh, 
  ct.type, 
  ct.value, 
  uc.status, 
  uc.expireAt,
  uc.createdAt
FROM userCoupons uc
JOIN couponTemplates ct ON uc.templateId = ct.id
WHERE uc.userId = 2
ORDER BY uc.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
command:

  uc.createdAt

JOIN couponTemplates ct ON uc.templateId = ct.id
WHERE uc.userId = 2
